content: That error message has nothing to do with the full name. Thunderbird is unable to login at the server. It doesn't use the Full Name provided to login at the server.
creator: stancestans

content:
Got it to clear the ignore thread flag.

Only worked in the inbox, and not in the search folder, after ticking "View/Threads/Ignored Threads" to make the missing items reappear.
creator: r.burrowes

content: Looking at one of the invisible messages, I see it has 'Ignore Thread' set. I can't seem to unset this, and certainly didn't set it.
creator: r.burrowes

content: Add to this. Not all old messages in the inbox show up either. I can see 4 read ones, but a 'Search' folder, with a filter criteria of listing files < 10 days old, is showing 13 others and the in Inbox header says "Inbox 19 Messages"
creator: r.burrowes

content: macOS Ventura 13.5.2 Thunderbird 115.2.3 (64-bit) Connecting to O365 Exchange outlook.office365.com
creator: r.burrowes

content: Turn off the Unified Folders view and turn it back on. If that alone doesn't fix it, right-click the Sent unified folder, select Properties, then click the Choose button. Make sure the Sent folder for all accounts are ticked, then click OK then finally click Update. This should update the Sent Unified Folder.
creator: stancestans
